artist: Artist: Agosto Machado; Author: Romy Ashby; Publisher: Romy Ashby , New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical image of expressionist deer with letterpress text printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; 30 pp.
inscription:
P. 3, gold marker: (illeg. signiture) 27 January 2016
P. 4, black ink pen: For Fly - a True / East Village Artist / who travels the / world + records / Truth, / (illeg.) + love, / (illeg. signiture)
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Housedeer, no. 5
